name: The Lonely Miner V1.2
description:
get your wife back for 5 diamond!

how to play:

Arrow Keys. Movement

Go to the diamonds (blue blocks)

Don't get squashed by a stone! (also don't touch those heavy stones)

Contents:

10 easy levels

14 tutorial levels

15 hard levels

good and bad ending

Updates:

V1.1: added good ending, glas, wall of fire and bug fixes

V1.2: added main and choise menu and bug fixes
